Commands.Shield Subverter: 1-HIT melee BRV+HP Attack  Grants 「Mnejing’s Wisdom」 for 3 turns  Grants 「Automaton」 to allies (except self) for 2 turns   「Mnejing’s Wisdom」 has the following effects:  - Raises Defense  - Raises Debuff Evasion Rate  - Grants BRV Damage Reduction   「Automaton」 grants BRV Regen   While buffed, 「BRV Attack」 turns into 「BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning)」  　∟ 1-HIT Melee BRV Attack  　　Raises allies' BRV based on Max BRV  　　Grants 「Fine-Tuning」 to all allies (except self) for 4 turns  　　Extends the duration of own existing 「Mnejing’s Wisdom」 by 1 turn  　　Extends the duration of ally’s existing 「Automaton」 by 1 turn   「Fine-Tuning」 has the following effects:  - Raises Defense (50%)  - Raises Debuff Evasion Rate  - Grants BRV Damage Reduction
Commands.Sixth Element: 6-HIT magic BRV+HP Attack  Grants 「Ovjang’s Wisdom」 for 3 turns  Grants 「Automaton」 to all allies (except self) for 2 turns   「Ovjang’s Wisdom」 raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed   While buffed, 「HP Attack」 turns into 「HP Attack+ (Optimization)」,  　∟ 1-HIT Magic BRV+HP Attack  　　Grants 「Optimization」 to all allies (except self) for 4 turns  　　Extends the duration of own existing 「Mnejing’s Wisdom」 by 1 turn  　　Extends the duration of ally’s existing 「Automaton」 by 1 turn   「Optimization」 raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed
Commands.Puppeteer Buff Long: Slightly raises Initial BRV Up for 2 turns  Extends the duration of own existing 「Mnejing’s Wisdom」 and 「Ovjang’s Wisdom」 by 2 turns  Extends the duration of allies existing 「Automaton」, 「Optimization」 and 「Fine-Tuning」 by 1 turn  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Shield Subverter Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Shield Subverter
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Sixth Element Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Sixth Element
Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack)
Passives.Unarmed Puppeteer: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Shield Subverter Extend: When using  Shield Subverter :- Raises BRV based on Max BRV before the BRV attack- Increases the number of BRV Hits to 2- Moderately raises its potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves the effects of  BRV Regen  and  Defense Up  from  Mnejing s Wisdom - Moderately improves the  Debuff Evasion Rate Up  effect from  Mnejing s Wisdom - Moderately improves the effects of  Automaton When using  BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning) :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Max BRV- Slightly improves the effects of  BRV Regen  and  Defense Up  from  Fine-Tuning - Moderately improves the  Debuff Evasion Rate Up  effect from  Fine-Tuning - Extends the duration of existing  Mnejing s Wisdom  by 1 turn- Extends the duration of allies' existing  Automaton  by 1 turn
Passives.Buff Base&Attack All: Moderately raises party Initial BRV and slightly raises party Attack
Passives.Sixth Element Extend: When using  Sixth Element :- Greatly raises its potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Slightly improves the effects of  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  from  Ovjang s Wisdom - Marginally improves the  Speed Up  from  Ovjang s Wisdom - Moderately improves the effects of  Automaton When using  HP Attack+ (Fine-Tuning) :- Moderately raises its potency- Slightly improves the effects of  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  from  Optimization - Marginally improves the  Speed Up  from  Optimization - Extends the duration of existing  Ovjang s Wisdom  by 1 turn- Extends the duration of allies' existing  Automaton  by 1 turn
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Power: Raises party Initial BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Puppeteer Buff Long Extend: When using  Puppeteer Buff Long :- Slightly improves  Initial BRV  effect

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Puppeteer Buff Long  use +1Extends the duration of existing [Mnejing s Wisdom] and [Ovjang s Wisdom] by 1 more turnExtends the duration of existing [Automaton], [Optimization] and [Fine-Tuning] by 1 more turn
Weapons.Poppet Katar CP: 15: When using  Shield Subverter :- Increase its BRV Potency- Raises BRV based on 30% of HP Damage Dealt- Improves the effects of  Mnejing s Wisdom  and extends its duration by 3 turns- Improves the effects of  Automaton  and extends its duration by 2 turnsWhen using  BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning) :- Improves the effects of  Fine-Tuning  and extends its duration by 2 turns
Weapons.Pigme Sainti CP: 35: When using  Sixth Element :- Increase its BRV Potency- Inflicts  Speed Down  to target for 4 turns- Improves the effect of  Ovjang s Wisdom  and extends its duration by 3 turns- Improves the effect of  Automaton  and extends its duration by 2 turns- Lowers Action DelayWhen using  HP Attack+ (Optimization) :- Improves the effect of  Optimization  and extends its duration by 2 turns
